value.title: Create and share your first Power BI report
value.excerpt: With Power BI, you can create compelling visuals and reports. In this module, you learn how to use Power BI Desktop to connect to data, build visuals, and create a report that you can share with others in your organization. You then learn how to publish the report to the Power BI service, so that others can see your insights and benefit from your work.

value.title: Write DAX formulas for Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to write DAX formulas to create calculated tables, calculated columns, and measures, which are different types of model calculations. Additionally, you'll learn how to write and format DAX formulas, which consist of expressions that use functions, operators, references to model objects, constants, and variables.

value.title: Work with requirements as a solution architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: It is important to capture the customer’s needs accurately. This module explains how to capture requirements and identify functional and non-functional items.

value.title: Measure Teams collaboration with the Teams insights dashboard in Workplace Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to prepare and generate useful data using the Workplace Analytics Power BI Teams insights dashboard.  Analyze Microsoft Teams adoption trends from the populated reports.

value.title: Drive organizational change with Microsoft Workplace Analytics and MyAnalytics
value.excerpt: After using Microsoft Workplace Analytics and Power BI to generate insights about your employees’ work behaviors, you’ll learn about the Microsoft 365 features that can be tools to implement and measure the changes you’ve identified. You’ll learn how to initiate common change practices and what tools and tactics are the most useful.

value.title: Analyze collaboration and engagement using the Workplace Analytics Ways of working assessment dashboard
value.excerpt: Learn to evaluate collaboration culture and employee experience with a Power BI template using Workplace Analytics data.

value.title: Change The Font  Across All Visuals in a Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly change all the text in Power BI with the theme options in Power BI
